Package org.quickserver.util.pool.thread

Classes for managing the pool of threads for handling clients.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClientPool This is a class for managing the pool of threads for handling clients.
ClientThread This is the worker thread used to handle clients using ClientHandler
ThreadObjectFactory A factory for creating ClientThread instances.
 

Package org.quickserver.util.pool.thread Description

Classes for managing the pool of threads for handling clients.
